##Types of Activity

The following are types of activities analyzed for the scope of this study:

1. Walking
2. Walking Upstairs
3. Walking Downstairs
4. Sitting 
5. Standing
6. Laying

##Conversions in variable name from base data

The following are the changes made to the main dataset to makes the dataset more readable:

* f -> frequency
* t -> time
* Gyro -> Gyroscope
* Acc -> Acceleration
* BodyBody -> Body
